## iter8 run

Run an experiment

### Synopsis

Run an experiment

```
iter8 run [flags]
```

### Examples

```

	# Run experiment defined in file 'experiment.yaml' and write result to 'result.yaml'
	iter8 run
	
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for run
```
